byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS

abstract: Pres Obama sends Congress plan to close prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, latest move in ongoing effort to fulfill significant promise of his presidency; expresses deep frustration at political roadblocks he has encountered in trying to shutter prison; Republican presidential candidates and lawmakers immediately reject plan.
lead_paragraph: The president has long worked to empty the prison in Cuba, which he calls a counterproductive symbol of American power.

headline.main: Obama Sends Plan to Close Guantánamo to Congress
headline.print_headline: Obama Submits a Plan to Close Guantánamo

snippet: The president has long worked to empty the prison in Cuba, which he calls a counterproductive symbol of American power.
